What base classes from the Java AWT will be used in the program?

Eine gute Antwort könnte sein:

  • JFrame
  • JButton

Picture of the Relationships

Here is a picture of the relationships. Unfortunately the boxes and the arrows are not labeled. The name of the frame class is buttonQuitter. You will need to fill in the labels. Use labels from the following selection:

 

  • JFrame
  • extends
  • buttonQuitter
  • ActionListener
  • instance of
  • implements
  • main
  • static
  • JButton
  • action events
  • buttonQuitter frame
  • refers to

 

FRAGE 20:

Label the relationship diagram.
